casebody.data:
IN RE: B.O.A. 264PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 2, 2019 Edward Eldred, Attorney at Law, for Barber, Lauren Erica Holly Williamson Batten, N. Kyle Hicks, Oxford, C. Gill Frazier, II, Attorneys at Law, for Granville County DSS Derek Martin Bast, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for B.O.A. Elizabeth Kennedy-Gurnee, Attorney at Law, for NCASSA

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of December 2018 by North Carolina Association of Social Service Attorneys to Allow Access to Record on Appeal:

*834"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of January 2019."
